steps: Create a full-width section that can house the new 'Most Recent Teaching' component at the top of the home page.
Component should display the cover photo as the background image, and overlay the title and description on it.
Component should be tall enough for most of the cover photo to be visible
Component should consider light and dark pictures as background images. The text should be readable in both cases.
Component should ultimately display the data returned from getMostRecentTeaching, a mock for a server-side function
